text: Shimpi is an umbrella term for the community involved traditionally in the eponymous business of clothing, tailoring and designing. Saint Namdev of the Bhakti movement is revered as the patron of the community. ==Notables== *Namdev - 14th century revered saint of the Bhakti movement and Varkari sect. *Chandrakant Mandare - Marathi actor, elder brother of Suryakant Mandare. *Shashikala - Indian actress ==References== * Category:Social groups of Maharashtra
title: Shimpi
